title: Need help with an in-game bug.
body:
Hey, I keep running into this bug in game. I reinstalled the game hoping it would help, but it didn't.

Minions disappear, so do abilities. Other times the turrets disappear or there are holes in the map. One time the re spawn timers disappeared.

Is there anything I can do on my end to fix it?

If not is this a known bug and being worked on?

I'm on a 2012 Mac and using the latest version of High Sierra OS.

replies.body: Hmmmm if you're missing complete champion models and sometimes the map has holes in it, some of those game files might be missing or corrupted somehow. Try running a quick repair through the game client and test it in a custom or practice game. Let me know if that doesn't help though!
It seems to have fixed it, thanks for the help!
ok cool, ill give it a shot, thx.
